text: Omar Efrain Torrijos Herrera (Feb 13, 1929 – July 31, 1981) was leader of Panama from 1968 to 1981, when he died in a plane crash. He is more commonly known as Omar Torrijos. Torrijos was the Commander of the Military of Panama. Even though Panama had a President, Torrijos was the leader. He is best known for making a treaty to give Panama full control of the Panama Canal. His son Martín Torrijos was elected president and served from 2004 to 2009. == References == Category:1929 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Anti- communists Category:Aviation deaths Category:Heads of state Category:Former dictators Category:Panamanian politicians
title: Omar Torrijos
